sourcesContent:
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CouriersService } from './couriers.service'; import { Couriers } from './Couriers'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { courier = new Couriers(); price: number | undefined; reject: string | undefined; // Dependency Injection constructor(http: HttpClient, private couriersService: CouriersService) {} ngOnInit(): void { } checkPrice() { this.couriersService.checkPrice(this.courier) .subscribe(data => { console.log(data) this.displayPrice(data); }) } displayPrice(_data: number | undefined) { this.price = _data; if (this.price == 0) { this.reject = "No Price found, Sorry we can accpet this parcel" } } title = 'PageUp Courier System'; }

{{title}}
